model

Class UserDataStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.UserDataStorage

  • public class UserDataStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class that holds user data. Used for admin user management and accessing user storage
    Author:
    Niles Ball, Scott Lahart
